Class CamelConnectionService

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectorService, Service
public class CamelConnectionService
extends AbstractCamelConnectorService

Concrete ConnectorService. Defines the URI's of the endpoints used by connections.

Author:
German Escobar
